name: logos-launcher
title: Logos Launcher
description: Opens books, verses or resources in Logos Bible Software
author: michael_marvive

commands.name: open-verse
commands.title: Open Verse in Logos
commands.subtitle: Open a Bible verse in Logos
commands.description: Open a Bible reference in Logos. Configure aliases (e.g. niv=niv2011, nasb=nasb95) in preferences to pick versions quickly. Version codes: niv, nasb95, message, esv, lsb, leb, nlt, kjv, nkjv, rsv. Enter aliases as JSON (e.g. {"esv":"esv"}) or comma-separated alias=version entries.

preferences.name: defaultVersion
preferences.title: Default Version
preferences.description: The Bible version to use when no alias prefix is provided.

preferences.name: versionAliases
preferences.title: Version Aliases
preferences.description: Add aliases such as niv=niv2011, nasb=nasb95, msg=message, esv=esv, lsb=lsb, leb=leb, nlt=nlt, kjv=kjv, nkjv=nkjv, rsv=rsv. Accepts JSON or comma-separated alias=version pairs (e.g. esv=esv, nasb=nasb95).

preferences.name: openMethod
preferences.title: Open Method
preferences.description: Choose how Raycast opens the verse in Logos.

preferences.name: copyUrlToClipboard
preferences.title: Copy final URL to clipboard
preferences.label: Copy final URL to clipboard
preferences.description: Copies the computed URL to the clipboard for troubleshooting.

commands.name: search-library
commands.title: Search Library
commands.subtitle: Find and open a Logos resource
commands.description: Search your Logos library by title or author and open a resource

preferences.name: catalogPath
preferences.title: Catalog DB Path Override
preferences.description: Optional path to catalog.db. Leave empty for auto-discovery.

preferences.name: openScheme
preferences.title: Open Scheme
preferences.description: Choose the first URL scheme to try when opening a resource.

commands.name: search-all
commands.title: Logos All Search
commands.subtitle: Search all Logos datasets
commands.description: Runs an All Search in Logos using the ref.ly endpoint.

commands.name: word-study
commands.title: Bible Word Study
commands.subtitle: Open Bible Word Study
commands.description: Launches the Bible Word Study tool in Logos via ref.ly.

preferences.name: autocompletePath
preferences.title: AutoComplete DB Path Override
preferences.description: Optional path to AutoComplete.db. Leave empty for auto-discovery.

commands.name: exegetical-guide
commands.title: Exegetical Guide
commands.subtitle: Open Exegetical Guide
commands.description: Type a Bible passage and open your Exegetical Guide in Logos.

preferences.name: guideTitle
preferences.title: Guide Title
preferences.description: Matches the guide title inside Logos.

preferences.name: referencePrefix
preferences.title: Reference Prefix
preferences.description: Prefix used when building Logos Bible references (defaults to BibleESV).

commands.name: search-factbook
commands.title: Search Factbook
commands.subtitle: Open a topic in Logos Factbook
commands.description: Browse indexed Factbook topics from Logos' AutoComplete database and open them instantly.

preferences.name: autocompletePath
preferences.title: AutoComplete DB Path Override
preferences.description: Optional path to AutoComplete.db. Leave empty for auto-discovery.

commands.name: reading-plans
commands.title: Reading Plans
commands.subtitle: Open today's Logos reading
commands.description: List your Logos reading plans and jump to today's assignment.

preferences.name: documentsDbPath
preferences.title: Documents DB Path Override
preferences.description: Optional path to ReadingPlan.db (or its parent folder). Leave empty for auto-discovery.

commands.name: open-layout
commands.title: Open Logos Layout
commands.subtitle: Load a saved Logos workspace
commands.description: Filter and launch your saved Logos layouts directly from Raycast.

preferences.name: documentsDbPath
preferences.title: Documents DB Path Override
preferences.description: Optional path to Layouts.db (or its parent folder). Leave empty for auto-discovery.

commands.name: tools-launcher
commands.title: Logos Tools Launcher
commands.subtitle: Search Logos tools & interactives
commands.description: Browse Atlas, Text Comparison, Sermon Builder, Copy Bible Verses, and dozens of interactives with autocomplete, then open them in Logos.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
